column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣad. tawshīḥ mkhl‘ al-basīṭ li’abī bikrun bn zahr
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣad. tawshīḥ lābin sahil

column2: qum wāintabih wāunẓur ilá dhāk al-‘idhār
waman ma‘ah bahj al-sanā ghunj al-shifār

column3: yaqwá yamḥū mā fī al-jabīn asbaq

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣad. zajal manhūk al-rajaz
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. qaṣīdah. basīṭ lilkhalīl bn aḥamd

column2: in kunt last ma‘ay fāldhikr mink ma‘ay
